value:
I can sympathize with the enemy's
desire to snatch up so many
Heroes.$k$pSometimes when you're lonely, it
helps to find the one thing that stokes
your fire—and then feed it!

My retainers, Beruka and Selena, are
adorable—and deadly too. I hope you
enjoy them as much as I do!

How sweet of you to look in on me.
If ever you get tired after battle, come
rest your weary head in my lap.

The scenery outside is stunning. You
and I should go strolling. I'd love to
find out all about your favorite places.

Let's watch out for each other. You
know what they say: I'll wash your
back if you'll wash mine!

Well, well... So you must be
$Nu.$k$pI'm a touch jealous. I was sent
to present you with a fond hello
from $Nf.
Now I'll really turn heads in battle.
Oh! That felt good.
Shame on me!

What's this? You must be growing
fonder of me.

I'm Camilla, eldest princess from the
Kingdom of Nohr. Need my protection,
sweetie? Consider me yours.

Why, if it isn't the one in this whole
group who makes me shiver in delight.
You, $Nu!$k$pI mean, that adorable face. What
sort of meanie would think of hurting
one hair on your sweet head!$k$pAnd that weapon of yours! It leaves
you totally defenseless. That makes me
want to just squeeze you to death!$k$pYou can count on your favorite,
Camilla, to take care of all of
your enemies.$k$pNow, whether I feel that way
because you're the summoner and
I'm a Hero...then so be it.$k$pI'm in favor of anything that brings us
together, even if for a short time.
I adore you completely!
はいっ
そぉれ
きゃあっ
Time to play!
Say night-night!
Sweet dreams.
You've been naughty.
Don't forget me!
Heehee
Oh? Did you need me? I'm always here for you.
Weary, friend? You may always rest your head in my lap.
Where are the royal baths here? A girl gets dirty in battle.
I'm yours to command. I'll slay anyone for you.
Need I worry for you, my sweet? I do hope all is well.
Where are Beruka and Selena, my darling retainers?
Aren't you adorable? So like my favorite sibling. Why don't you think of me as your big sister?
Yes?
Of course.
All right.
Naughty, naughty—calling on me like this!
